{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the ''Ranged Weapons'' category. It is a two-handed weapon}}

'''Shortbows''' are a starter [[ranged weapon]], slightly stronger than a [[sling]], but requiring two hands to wield. You'll likely want to upgrade to a [[orcbow]] once you have some Ranged Weapons skill. Shortbows are common in the early game, often in the hands of [[list of centaurs|centaurs]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], shortbows had 9 damage and a base delay of 15.
*Prior to [[0.29]], shortbows had a base delay of 13, a mindelay of 6 (at skill 14), used the [[Bows (skill)|Bows skill]], and required [[arrow]]s. They were also affected by the [[Ranged Weapons#History|ranged weapons rework]] of this version.
*Prior to [[0.15]], shortbows were simply called "[[bow (item)|bows]]".
